channel.title: I can't verify my error but hoping for help
channel.description: So I don't really know how to define this error as there is no error thrown to me at this time, but basically I have a compiled server and client, that should connect, and do for about 20 seconds can define if you are a new or old player also as new players can login start setting up character, but then it will just like refresh my login packet i think basically from the command prompt window as far as I can tell is that after i log on it reloops me through the login system and my player trie to double log so i get dicoed (could be the client but it works on another similar server this was based one and has no issues i tried cross comparisons but turned up nothing

item.title: I can't verify my error but hoping for help
item.dc:creator: @TOXSIN TOXSIN
item.description:
@TOXSIN wrote:

Divinity in Darkness custom server based off whitescape with coding help from a few others it had some original siabsoft coding as she was a major part in that project. I sent her a message too about it and will have her look at the coding again if needed. Its like the server will connect for a moment and allow you to type and such but then disconnects saving the game and then trying to automaticaly reconnect me, at an increasing port.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't verify my error but hoping for help

item.title: I can't verify my error but hoping for help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

What source/revision are you using? And what client. It could be many many things without knowing what server/client you’re using.

Read full topic

item.title: I can't verify my error but hoping for help
item.dc:creator: @TOXSIN TOXSIN
item.description:
@TOXSIN wrote:

So I don’t really know how to define this error as there is no error thrown to me at this time, but basically I have a compiled server and client, that should connect, and do for about 20 seconds can define if you are a new or old player also as new players can login start setting up character, but then it will just like refresh my login packet i think basically from the command prompt window as far as I can tell is that after i log on it reloops me through the login system and my player trie to double log so i get dicoed (could be the client but it works on another similar server this was based one and has no issues i tried cross comparisons but turned up nothing

Read full topic
